title: Create frontend with Next.js scaffold
description:
Initialize Next.js frontend with TypeScript.

## Command
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest frontend --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir
```

## Structure
```
frontend/
├── package.json
├── src/
│   ├── app/
│   │   ├── page.tsx           # Login
│   │   ├── dashboard/
│   │   │   └── page.tsx
│   │   └── recommendations/
│   │       └── page.tsx
│   └── components/
└── .env.local.example
```

## Decision
- Use App Router (recommended)
